trans-unit.source: Lot-/Serial No. Status

seg-source.mrk: Lot-/Serial No.
Status

trans-unit.source: In the Lot-/Serial No. Status page, several statuses can be created, which can then be assigned to a lot- or serial number. In addition to simply creating statuses, different use restrictions can be determined per status and up to ten statuses can be selected for display on the Item Card and the Inventory List pages.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Lot-/Serial No.
Status page, several statuses can be created, which can then be assigned to a lot- or serial number.
In addition to simply creating statuses, different use restrictions can be determined per status and up to ten statuses can be selected for display on the Item Card and the Inventory List pages.

trans-unit.source: : Lot-/Serial No. Status page

seg-source.mrk: : Lot-/Serial No.
Status page

trans-unit.source: The fields in this page are defined in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in this page are defined in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Code

seg-source.mrk: Code

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for the status.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier for the status.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Brief description of the status.

seg-source.mrk: Brief description of the status.

trans-unit.source: Status Type

seg-source.mrk: Status Type

trans-unit.source: Identifies how the status is used and controls the meaning of the Customer Filter and Country Filter fields. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Identifies how the status is used and controls the meaning of the Customer Filter and Country Filter fields.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Released – The lot is automatically released for all material movements. No entries can be made in the Customer Filter and Country Filter fields.

seg-source.mrk: Released – The lot is automatically released for all material movements.
No entries can be made in the Customer Filter and Country Filter fields.

trans-unit.source: Blocked – The lot is automatically blocked for all material movements. No entries can be made in the Customer Filter and Country Filter fields.

seg-source.mrk: Blocked – The lot is automatically blocked for all material movements.
No entries can be made in the Customer Filter and Country Filter fields.

trans-unit.source: Conditionally Released – at least one filter must be set in one of the following fields: Customer Filter or Country Filter. The chosen settings are checked in Sales.

seg-source.mrk: Conditionally Released – at least one filter must be set in one of the following fields: Customer Filter or Country Filter.
The chosen settings are checked in Sales.

trans-unit.source: When the Released or Blocked option is selected, certain fields for the data record are automatically pre-determined.

seg-source.mrk: When the Released or Blocked option is selected, certain fields for the data record are automatically pre-determined.

trans-unit.source: Pick - Sales

seg-source.mrk: Pick - Sales

trans-unit.source: If selected, the respective status is allowed for the sales picking. If not selected, inventory with this status cannot be picked in sales. In addition, this inventory is not taken into consideration for the automatic proposal of lot- or serial numbers in the picking order.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the respective status is allowed for the sales picking.
If not selected, inventory with this status cannot be picked in sales.
In addition, this inventory is not taken into consideration for the automatic proposal of lot- or serial numbers in the picking order.

trans-unit.source: This also applies for the Picks as well as the Inventory Picks in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: This also applies for the Picks as well as the Inventory Picks in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Pick - Manufacturing

seg-source.mrk: Pick - Manufacturing

trans-unit.source: If selected, the respective status is allowed for the manufacturing picking. If not selected, inventory with this status cannot be picked in manufacturing. In addition, this inventory is not taken into consideration for the automatic proposal of lot- or serial numbers in the picking order.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the respective status is allowed for the manufacturing picking.
If not selected, inventory with this status cannot be picked in manufacturing.
In addition, this inventory is not taken into consideration for the automatic proposal of lot- or serial numbers in the picking order.

trans-unit.source: This also applies for the Picks as well as the Inventory Picks in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: This also applies for the Picks as well as the Inventory Picks in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Pick - Transfer

seg-source.mrk: Pick - Transfer

trans-unit.source: If selected, the respective status is allowed for the transfer order picking. If not selected, inventory with this status cannot be picked for transfer orders. In addition, this inventory is not taken into consideration for the automatic proposal of lot- or serial numbers in the picking order.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the respective status is allowed for the transfer order picking.
If not selected, inventory with this status cannot be picked for transfer orders.
In addition, this inventory is not taken into consideration for the automatic proposal of lot- or serial numbers in the picking order.

trans-unit.source: This also applies for the Picks as well as the Inventory Picks in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: This also applies for the Picks as well as the Inventory Picks in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Customer Filter

seg-source.mrk: Customer Filter

trans-unit.source: Customer that the status relates to. The filter entered here is considered at the following places within the application:

seg-source.mrk: Customer that the status relates to.
The filter entered here is considered at the following places within the application:

trans-unit.source: Planning – Inventory that was released for certain customers is only considered for the fulfillment of demand of orders by these customers. For all other customers, this inventory is considered as not available in planning.

seg-source.mrk: Planning – Inventory that was released for certain customers is only considered for the fulfillment of demand of orders by these customers.
For all other customers, this inventory is considered as not available in planning.

trans-unit.source: Picking – Inventory that was released for certain customers is only used in the picking order if the respective sales order was created for this customer.

seg-source.mrk: Picking – Inventory that was released for certain customers is only used in the picking order if the respective sales order was created for this customer.

trans-unit.source: Item Availability Check in the Sales Order – When item availability is checked in the Sales Order, only inventory where the deposited customer filter on the status matches the customer number in the sales header is viewed as available. Inventory where the customer filter of the status does not match the customer in the sales header cannot be entered in the item tracking line.

seg-source.mrk: Item Availability Check in the Sales Order – When item availability is checked in the Sales Order, only inventory where the deposited customer filter on the status matches the customer number in the sales header is viewed as available.
Inventory where the customer filter of the status does not match the customer in the sales header cannot be entered in the item tracking line.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, the shipment posting is denied if the customer filter of the status does not match the customer number in the sales header (such as if the status was altered after entering the item tracking line).

seg-source.mrk: Furthermore, the shipment posting is denied if the customer filter of the status does not match the customer number in the sales header (such as if the status was altered after entering the item tracking line).

trans-unit.source: Country Filter

seg-source.mrk: Country Filter

trans-unit.source: Country that this status relates to. The filter entered here is considered at the following places within the application:

seg-source.mrk: Country that this status relates to.
The filter entered here is considered at the following places within the application:

trans-unit.source: Planning – Inventory that was released for a certain country is only considered for the fulfillment of demand of orders by customers where the country code of the customer matches the country code of the status. For all other sales- or blanket orders this inventory is considered as not available in planning.

seg-source.mrk: Planning – Inventory that was released for a certain country is only considered for the fulfillment of demand of orders by customers where the country code of the customer matches the country code of the status.
For all other sales- or blanket orders this inventory is considered as not available in planning.

trans-unit.source: Picking – Inventory that was released for certain countries is only used in the picking order if the country code of the customer in the sales order matches the country code in the status.

seg-source.mrk: Picking – Inventory that was released for certain countries is only used in the picking order if the country code of the customer in the sales order matches the country code in the status.

trans-unit.source: Item Availability check in the Sales Order – When item availability is checked in the Sales Order, only inventory where the deposited country code filter at the status matches the country code of the customer in the sales header is viewed as available. Inventory where the country code filter of the status does not match country code of the customer in the sales header cannot be entered in the item tracking line.

seg-source.mrk: Item Availability check in the Sales Order – When item availability is checked in the Sales Order, only inventory where the deposited country code filter at the status matches the country code of the customer in the sales header is viewed as available.
Inventory where the country code filter of the status does not match country code of the customer in the sales header cannot be entered in the item tracking line.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, the shipment posting is denied if the country code filter of the status does not match the country code of the customer in the sales header (such as if the status was altered after entering the item tracking line).

seg-source.mrk: Furthermore, the shipment posting is denied if the country code filter of the status does not match the country code of the customer in the sales header (such as if the status was altered after entering the item tracking line).

trans-unit.source: Prod. Rel. Comp. Check

seg-source.mrk: Prod.
Rel.
Comp.
Check

trans-unit.source: If selected – and the status of a manufactured lot or serial number is changed to this status – the system will check if the lot statuses of the consumed lots are permitted for the alteration of the status of the manufactured lot.

seg-source.mrk: If selected – and the status of a manufactured lot or serial number is changed to this status – the system will check if the lot statuses of the consumed lots are permitted for the alteration of the status of the manufactured lot.

trans-unit.source: The definition which lot statuses of the consumed lots are permitted is based on the Allowed at Prod. Rel. Comp. Check field (refer to next field).

seg-source.mrk: The definition which lot statuses of the consumed lots are permitted is based on the <span class="Bold">Allowed at Prod.
Rel.
Comp.
Check field (refer to next field).

trans-unit.source: Allowed at Prod. Rel. Comp. Check

seg-source.mrk: Allowed at Prod.
Rel.
Comp.
Check

trans-unit.source: If selected, the respective lot status at the Prod. Rel. Comp. Check field is permitted and thus the lot status change of the manufactured lot is allowed.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the respective lot status at the <span class="Bold">Prod.
Rel.
Comp.
Check field is permitted and thus the lot status change of the manufactured lot is allowed.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Ensure that this status is set up as an allowed posting for the consumption posting in the Inventory Posting Permission Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that this status is set up as an allowed posting for the consumption posting in the Inventory Posting Permission Setup page.

trans-unit.source: Reorder Point

seg-source.mrk: Reorder Point

trans-unit.source: If selected, inventory with this status is taken into consideration in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning for the fulfillment of a defined reorder point on the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, inventory with this status is taken into consideration in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning for the fulfillment of a defined reorder point on the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: Safety Stock

seg-source.mrk: Safety Stock

trans-unit.source: If selected, inventory with this status is taken into consideration in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning for the fulfillment of a defined safety stock on the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, inventory with this status is taken into consideration in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning for the fulfillment of a defined safety stock on the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: Test Order Check

seg-source.mrk: Test Order Check

trans-unit.source: If selected – and the status is changed to this status – the system checks whether an open Test Order (status other than Finished) for this lot- or serial number exists. If an open Test Order exists, the action will be interrupted.

seg-source.mrk: If selected – and the status is changed to this status – the system checks whether an open Test Order (status other than Finished) for this lot- or serial number exists.
If an open Test Order exists, the action will be interrupted.

trans-unit.source: Available for Planning

seg-source.mrk: Available for Planning

trans-unit.source: If selected, inventory with this status is viewed as available in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning. This field is also taken into consideration during the availability check in the item availability pages.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, inventory with this status is viewed as available in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning.
This field is also taken into consideration during the availability check in the item availability pages.

trans-unit.source: Exprd. Invt. avail. for Plng.

seg-source.mrk: Exprd.
Invt.
avail.
for Plng.

trans-unit.source: If selected, inventory with this status where the expiration date is passed is viewed as available in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, inventory with this status where the expiration date is passed is viewed as available in the Microsoft Dynamics NAV planning.

trans-unit.source: Pick expir. Inv. - Sales

seg-source.mrk: Pick expir.
Inv.
- Sales

trans-unit.source: If selected, expired lots with this status can be selected in the pick document for sales orders.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, expired lots with this status can be selected in the pick document for sales orders.

trans-unit.source: Pick expir. Inv. - Manuf.

seg-source.mrk: Pick expir.
Inv.
- Manuf.

trans-unit.source: If selected, expired lots with this status can be selected in the pick document for production orders.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, expired lots with this status can be selected in the pick document for production orders.

trans-unit.source: Pick expir. Inv. - Transfer

seg-source.mrk: Pick expir.
Inv.
- Transfer

trans-unit.source: If selected, expired lots with this status can be selected in the pick document for transfer orders.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, expired lots with this status can be selected in the pick document for transfer orders.

trans-unit.source: Show in Inv. List / Item Card

seg-source.mrk: Show in Inv.
List / Item Card

trans-unit.source: If selected, the available inventory for the status is shown in the Inventory List page and on the QM FastTab of the Item Card. Furthermore, the selected statuses appear in the Item Details - Inventory FactBox on the Sales Order and Prod. Order Components pages.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the available inventory for the status is shown in the Inventory List page and on the QM FastTab of the Item Card.
Furthermore, the selected statuses appear in the Item Details - Inventory FactBox on the Sales Order and Prod.
Order Components pages.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This check box can be selected on a maximum of ten statuses.

seg-source.mrk: This check box can be selected on a maximum of ten statuses.

trans-unit.source: Color Code

seg-source.mrk: Color Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates a color to provide status visualization to either the entire line or only the Status field on the following pages:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates a color to provide status visualization to either the entire line or only the Status field on the following pages:

trans-unit.source: Lot-/Serial No. Administration – entire line except the New Status field will show the relevant status color until the change is posted

seg-source.mrk: Lot-/Serial No.
Administration – entire line except the New Status field will show the relevant status color until the change is posted
